title: where are people coming from.
body:
People on the boards are coming in like waves with the same ideas and very little diversity. When I joined the forums, it started with "nerf yasuo", then "nerf draven", than "revert rengar", and now "bring back urf". I think Riot should watch out for such posts. For example it's fine that people are bringing up those topics, but if suddenly hundres of threads regarding the same thing are popping up, than riot should take it with a grain of salty players.... kappa.

Edit 1: and than people going against such topics would get downvoted, even if they had good points.

replies.body: Yeah...  They're called 'circle jerks', and they pop up every now and then.

It's because they want attention, period.


A spur of the moment post because they lost to said champion 90% of the time.


Instead of learning the game, they'd rather complain and have it removed from the game.


Which makes it even funnier when people come to cry about someone like... Annie or lux every so often..There was a post recently that someone went into story mode about how urgot was broken, and when i looked them up they had just lost to an urgot
